sentences.english: There is little of Satie's sardonic wit to be heard in Skempton's works.
sentences.chinese: 在斯開普頓的作品裏幾乎聽不到薩蒂那種譏諷的智慧。

sentences.english: All morning I have noticed Sunday stealing glances at the plane.
sentences.chinese: 整個早上，我都注意到薩蒂在偷偷地瞟着飛機。

sentences.english: Soon enough the Sardinians will sue for peace and you will have secured the safety of south France.
sentences.chinese: 很快的薩蒂尼亞將求和，您將已獲得法國南部的安全。

sentences.english: Mr. Ezzati said China has the resources to make changes.
sentences.chinese: 艾薩蒂說，中國有能力改變現狀。

sentences.english: There, in the very end, I saw Sadie sitting in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，我見到了蹲在角落裏的薩蒂。
